fields.name: Nouriskin Retinol Renewal 1
fields.description: A beginner-friendly retinol serum that helps improve skin texture and reduce fine lines.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a small amount to the face after cleansing, avoiding the eye area. Use in the evening, followed by a moisturizer. Use sunscreen during the day.

fields.name: Nouriskin Retinol Renewal 2
fields.description: An advanced formula retinol serum for smoother, younger-looking skin.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a thin layer to clean, dry skin in the evening. Follow with a hydrating moisturizer. Wear sunscreen during the day.

fields.name: Nouriskin Retinol Renewal 3
fields.description: High-strength retinol serum designed to refine pores and even out skin tone.
fields.how_to_use: Use in the evening after cleansing and toning. Start with a small amount and gradually increase as tolerated. Apply moisturizer afterward. Use SPF during the day.

fields.name: Nouriskin Retinol Renewal 4
fields.description: A gentle retinol blend that targets subtle signs of aging while maintaining moisture.
fields.how_to_use: Apply evenly to clean skin at night, avoiding the eye area. Follow with a nourishing moisturizer. Use sunscreen during the day.

fields.name: Nouriskin Retinol Renewal 5
fields.description: Potent retinol enhanced with botanicals for a radiant and revitalized complexion.
fields.how_to_use: Dispense 1-2 pumps and gently smooth onto clean skin in the evening. Follow with a moisturizer and avoid sunlight without SPF.

fields.name: Nouriskin Retinol Renewal 6
fields.description: High-grade retinol serum for advanced users aiming for significant texture improvement.
fields.how_to_use: Apply 1-2 drops to clean, dry skin in the evening. Follow with a moisturizer. Always wear SPF during the day.

fields.name: Nouriskin Deep Moisture Cream
fields.description: A rich moisturiser that provides long-lasting hydration and leaves skin feeling supple.
fields.how_to_use: Massage a generous amount onto clean skin in the morning and evening. Reapply as needed for extra hydration.

fields.name: Nouriskin Light Day Moisturiser
fields.description: A lightweight daily moisturiser infused with vitamins and hyaluronic acid.
fields.how_to_use: Smooth onto clean face and neck in the morning. Allow it to absorb before applying makeup or sunscreen.

fields.name: Nouriskin Calming Night Cream
fields.description: A soothing nighttime moisturiser that helps calm and repair skin overnight.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a thin layer to clean skin as the last step in your nighttime routine. Massage gently until fully absorbed.

fields.name: Nouriskin Hydration Boost Balm
fields.description: A concentrated balm delivering intense moisture to dry, dehydrated skin.
fields.how_to_use: Warm a small amount between fingers and press gently onto areas needing intense hydration.

fields.name: Nouriskin Daily Defense Moisturiser
fields.description: A protective moisturiser with SPF to shield your skin from environmental stressors.
fields.how_to_use: Apply generously to face and neck in the morning. Reapply every 2 hours when exposed to sunlight.

fields.name: Nouriskin Ultra-Rich Cream
fields.description: A luxurious, ultra-rich moisturiser for very dry skin types.
fields.how_to_use: Apply liberally to clean, dry skin morning and night. Focus on areas prone to dryness.

fields.name: Nouriskin Revitalizing Clay Mask
fields.description: A purifying clay mask that draws out impurities and refines pores.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a thin, even layer to clean skin. Leave on for 10-15 minutes, then rinse with lukewarm water. Use 1-2 times a week.

fields.name: Nouriskin Brightening Sheet Mask
fields.description: A sheet mask infused with brightening agents for a more radiant complexion.
fields.how_to_use: Unfold the mask and place it over clean skin. Leave on for 15-20 minutes. Remove and gently pat excess serum into the skin.

fields.name: Nouriskin Hydrating Gel Mask
fields.description: A cooling gel mask that restores moisture and soothes stressed skin.
fields.how_to_use: Apply generously to clean skin. Leave on for 10-15 minutes, then rinse or tissue off. Can be used daily.

fields.name: Nouriskin Detox Charcoal Mask
fields.description: A detoxifying charcoal mask that helps clear pores and balance oily skin.
fields.how_to_use: Spread evenly on clean skin, avoiding the eye area. Leave on for 10-15 minutes and rinse thoroughly. Use weekly.

fields.name: Nouriskin Nourishing Cream Mask
fields.description: A creamy, nutrient-rich mask for a soft, supple skin finish.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a generous layer to clean skin. Leave on for 10-15 minutes. Wipe off excess or rinse. Use 2-3 times a week.

fields.name: Nouriskin Vitamin Infusion Mask
fields.description: A mask enriched with vitamins to revive dull, tired-looking skin.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a thick layer to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 10 minutes, then rinse with warm water. Can be used 2-3 times a week.

fields.name: Nouriskin Hydrating Serum
fields.description: A lightweight serum infused with hyaluronic acid for deep hydration.
fields.how_to_use: Apply 1-2 drops to clean skin in the morning and evening. Follow with a moisturizer.

fields.name: Nouriskin Brightening Serum
fields.description: A vitamin C-packed serum that promotes a brighter, more even skin tone.
fields.how_to_use: Apply 3-4 drops to clean, dry skin in the morning. Follow with sunscreen.

fields.name: Nouriskin Anti-Aging Serum
fields.description: A serum with peptides to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a thin layer to clean skin at night. Follow with a moisturizer.

fields.name: Nouriskin Clarifying Serum
fields.description: A BHA-based serum to help clear pores and prevent breakouts.
fields.how_to_use: Use 2-3 drops on clean, dry skin in the evening. Avoid using with other exfoliants.

fields.name: Nouriskin Firming Serum
fields.description: A collagen-boosting serum that helps improve skin elasticity.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a few drops to clean skin morning and night. Follow with moisturizer.

fields.name: Nouriskin Glow Serum
fields.description: A radiance-enhancing serum that leaves your skin glowing and smooth.
fields.how_to_use: Apply 2-3 drops to clean, dry skin in the morning and evening. Follow with SPF.

fields.name: Nouriskin Special Sale Moisturiser
fields.description: A limited-time offer moisturiser at a discounted price.
fields.how_to_use: Massage a generous amount into clean skin morning and night.

fields.name: Nouriskin Clearance Retinol
fields.description: A retinol serum on clearance, perfect for trying out retinol at a low cost.
fields.how_to_use: Apply at night to clean, dry skin. Use sunscreen during the day.

fields.name: Nouriskin Discounted Mask Bundle
fields.description: A set of three masks offered at a special bundle price.
fields.how_to_use: Follow instructions for each mask included in the bundle.

fields.name: Nouriskin Sale Serum
fields.description: A bestselling serum now available at a reduced price.
fields.how_to_use: Apply a few drops to clean skin morning and night. Follow with a moisturizer.

fields.name: Nouriskin Seasonal Offer Cleanser
fields.description: A gentle cleanser on seasonal sale, limited stock.
fields.how_to_use: Massage onto wet skin, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use morning and evening.

fields.name: Nouriskin Festive Discount Toner
fields.description: A toner offered at a festive discount, while supplies last.
fields.how_to_use: Apply to clean skin using a cotton pad or hands. Use morning and night.
